about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: All of the following practices are dangerous to do while driving. Which of these is also illegal?

hasPart.text: Even people with good hearing cannot hear well if the radio or CD player is blaring. Do not wear a headset or earplugs in both ears while driving; it is against the law.

suggestedAnswer.text: Listening to music through headphones that cover both ears.

comment.text: Listening to music through headphones that cover both ears.

suggestedAnswer.text: Transporting an unrestrained animal inside the vehicle.

hasPart.text: This sign prohibits right turns. It is illegal to turn right at an intersection where this sign is posted.

comment.text: You must turn right.
No right turns permitted.

suggestedAnswer.text: Right turns permitted on a red light.

comment.text: Right turns permitted on a red light.
No right turns permitted.

answerExplanation.text: This sign prohibits right turns. It is illegal to turn right at an intersection where this sign is posted.

hasPart.name: You must look for bicyclists in the same lanes used by motor vehicles because they:

about.name: You must look for bicyclists in the same lanes used by motor vehicles because they:

hasPart.assesses: You must look for bicyclists in the same lanes used by motor vehicles because they: | You must look for bicyclists in the same lanes used by motor vehicles because they: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Bicyclists have the right to operate on the road and may lawfully be permitted to ride on certain sections of freeways where there is no alternate route and bicycling is not forbidden by a sign. Watch for bicyclists and share the road when they are present.

comment.text: Must ride facing oncoming traffic.

suggestedAnswer.text: Illegally share lanes with motor vehicles.

comment.text: Illegally share lanes with motor vehicles.

suggestedAnswer.text: Are entitled to share the road with motor vehicles.

comment.text: Are entitled to share the road with motor vehicles.

acceptedAnswer.text: Are entitled to share the road with motor vehicles.

comment.text: Are entitled to share the road with motor vehicles.

answerExplanation.text: Bicyclists have the right to operate on the road and may lawfully be permitted to ride on certain sections of freeways where there is no alternate route and bicycling is not forbidden by a sign. Watch for bicyclists and share the road when they are present.

comment.text: You must look for bicyclists in the same lanes used by motor vehicles because they: | Bicyclists have the right to operate on the road and may lawfully be permitted to ride on certain sections of freeways where there is no alternate route and bicycling is not forbidden by a sign. Watch for bicyclists and share the road when they are present.

hasPart.text: No stopping, standing, or parking is permitted next to a red painted curb. However, buses may stop in a red curb zone marked for buses.

suggestedAnswer.text: On the side of the freeway in an emergency.

comment.text: On the side of the freeway in an emergency.

suggestedAnswer.text: Next to a red painted curb.

comment.text: Next to a red painted curb.

suggestedAnswer.text: Within 100 feet of an elementary school.

comment.text: Within 100 feet of an elementary school.

acceptedAnswer.text: Next to a red painted curb.

comment.text: Next to a red painted curb.

answerExplanation.text: No stopping, standing, or parking is permitted next to a red painted curb. However, buses may stop in a red curb zone marked for buses.

hasPart.name: This sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This sign means: | This sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: This sign alerts you to the possibility of traffic merging into the main stream of travel. After checking to your side and rear, you should move into another lane, if possible, to allow merging motorists a clear path.

suggestedAnswer.text: You should stop for other traffic.

comment.text: You should stop for other traffic.

suggestedAnswer.text: Traffic is entering from another road and you should allow additional space for drivers to merge safely into the flow of traffic.

comment.text: Traffic is entering from another road and you should allow additional space for drivers to merge safely into the flow of traffic.

suggestedAnswer.text: Traffic is entering from another road and you should keep right.

comment.text: Traffic is entering from another road and you should keep right.

acceptedAnswer.text: Traffic is entering from another road and you should allow additional space for drivers to merge safely into the flow of traffic.

comment.text: Traffic is entering from another road and you should allow additional space for drivers to merge safely into the flow of traffic.

answerExplanation.text: This sign alerts you to the possibility of traffic merging into the main stream of travel. After checking to your side and rear, you should move into another lane, if possible, to allow merging motorists a clear path.

comment.text: This sign means: | This sign alerts you to the possibility of traffic merging into the main stream of travel. After checking to your side and rear, you should move into another lane, if possible, to allow merging motorists a clear path.
